artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Kikuya Kōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
inscription:
The beauty of this beach is extreme
There are many brushwood to grow seaweed that is the special froduct in this area, known in all over the country

Japanese:kono umigishi no zekkei wa saranari
o_ku soda wo tate nori wo tori kono atari no meisan tote
kono nori shokoku ni kanseru mononari
medium: From a woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Souvenir of Edo, Part Two (Ehon Edo miyage, nihen 絵本江戸土産　二編)
title: Samezu Beach at Ōmori, South of Shinagawa
